comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

Checked email + applied filtering.


Actual results:

Messages were filtered to the right mailboxes, and the mailbox names turned blue, but there is no option to automatically open all of them in tabs.


Expected results:

There should be an option to open all these mailboxes with newly received messages in separate tabs (like Eudora).
comments.creator: handyman858@yahoo.com
comments.author: handyman858@yahoo.com

Steps to reproduce:

Checked email + applied filtering.


Actual results:

Expected results:
